(slow-to-recruit [slow_to_recruit], mounted [mounted], ethereal [ethereal])

item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, 2 misc
The Grey Lords are the commanders of the Grey Knights. They share the Shadow Seers' ability to ignore the passage of time and are just as difficult to observe. They are previously only known from legends.
